title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Slow down to speak your truth today, especially to loved ones who rally to support you time and time again. Although you may experience a powerful surge of emotionally charged energy now, your initial reaction might be to brush it off and tackle a lot of tasks instead. Curb your inclination to get busy and redirect it toward talking through your feelings. The silver-tongued Gemini Moon creates a sweet trine to vivacious Venus in your 7th House of Others, inspiring your clever eloquence and sparkling charm. Lighten your load by unburdening your heart. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
